APP_STARTED.description: This event is fired when the app starts

props.verified: boolean reflecting if the target user is verified

FOLLOW_CREATED.description: This event is fired when a user is followed

props.verified: boolean reflecting if the target user is verified

FOLLOW_DESTROYED.description: This event is fired when a user is unfollowed

props.verified: boolean reflecting if the target user is verified

USER_SUBSCRIPTION_CREATED.description: This event is fired when a user has been subscribed to

props.verified: boolean reflecting if the target user is verified

USER_SUBSCRIPTION_DESTROYED.description: This event is fired when a user has been unsubscribed from

props.sponsored: boolean reflecting if the post is sponsored
props.featured: boolean reflecting if the post is featured
props.parent_id: the posts parent id (only present if parent post is not nil)

LIKE_CREATED.description: This event is fired when a user has liked a post

props.sponsored: boolean reflecting if the post is sponsored
props.featured: boolean reflecting if the post is featured
props.parent_id: the posts parent id (only present if parent post is not nil)

LIKE_DESTROYED.description: This event is fired when a user has unliked a post

props.sponsored: boolean reflecting if the post is sponsored
props.featured: boolean reflecting if the post is featured
props.parent_id: the posts parent id (only present if parent post is not nil)

POST_FLAGGED.description: This event is fired when a user has flagged a post

props.sponsored: boolean reflecting if the post is sponsored
props.featured: boolean reflecting if the post is featured
props.parent_id: the posts parent id (only present if parent post is not nil)

POST_CREATED.description: This event is fired when a user creates a post

props.sponsored: boolean reflecting if the post is sponsored
props.featured: boolean reflecting if the post is featured
props.parent_id: the posts parent id (only present if parent post is not nil)

POST_DESTROYED.description: This event is fired when a user deletes a post

props.sponsored: boolean reflecting if the post is sponsored
props.featured: boolean reflecting if the post is featured

POST_RESPONSE_CREATED.description: This event is fired when a user creates a comment or reply

props.sponsored: boolean reflecting if the post is sponsored
props.featured: boolean reflecting if the post is featured

POST_RESPONSE_DESTROYED.description: This event is fired when a user deletes a comment or reply

props.group_join_request: the state of the group join request (approved, pending, denied)

GROUP_JOINED.description: This event is fired the user has applied to join a group

GROUP_LEFT.description: This event is fired when a user leaves a group

CHAT_ENTERED.description: This event is fired when a user enters the presence channel=

CHAT_LEFT.description: This event is fired when a user leaves the presence channel=

CHAT_MESSAGE_CREATED.description: This event is fired when a user creates a chat

CHAT_MESSAGE_REPORTED.description: This event is fired when a user reports a chat

REACTION_CREATED.description: This event is fired when a user creates a reaction
